description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in ownCloud 4.5.x before 4.5.8 allow remote authenticated users with administrator privileges to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) quota parameter to /core/settings/ajax/setquota.php, or remote authenticated users with group admin privileges to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (2) group field to settings.php or (3) "share with" field.
